messages.subject: 10 yr. old unschooler
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/15/02 9:47:48 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/15/02 9:47:48 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< We presently do not personally know any
unschoolers and she would enjoy the friendship of someone who lives
her lifestlye. >>

My ds had the same dilemna for a while....we managed to find a couple
unschooling families here, and now have another family trying to transition
to unschooling.
Anyway, I forwarded you dd's e-mail addy to him. He's 12 and really enjoys
chatting with other unschoolers online.
Ren
